headline: Bloom Energy (BE) Gains Analyst Confidence Amid U.S. Grid Acceleration Push
summary: Bloom Energy Corporation (NYSE:BE) is one of the AI Stocks Analysts are Tracking Closely. On October 27, UBS analyst Manav Gupta reiterated a Buy rating on the stock with a $115.00 price target. The firm cited policy tailwinds expected to enable faster grid approvals and fuel data center demand. UBS pinpointed a recent Bloomberg report about U.S. […]

headline: AEP capital spending plan surges 33%, to $72B, in utility ‘super-cycle’
summary: Even with the increasing spending, American Electric Power expects it can limit residential rate hikes to 3.5% a year over the next five years, company officials said during an earnings call on Wednesday.

headline: BMO Stays Bullish on American Electric Power (AEP), Citing Strong Capex Outlook
summary: American Electric Power Company, Inc. (NASDAQ:AEP) is one of the best high-growth utility stocks to buy. On October 16, BMO Capital reiterated an Outperform rating on AEP and lifted the price target from $121 to $127. The updated price target was announced in light of the company’s upcoming Q3 2025 financial results, scheduled for release […]
